app.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) is a service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS) that provides object storage through a web service interface. Also supports any S3 Compatible Storage - a storage solution that allows access to and management of the data it stores over an S3 compliant interface.

endpoint.label: S3 endpoint
endpoint.tooltip: Optional. Provide the endpoint URL if you are using non-AWS S3 compatible storage

bucket.label: S3 bucket
bucket.tooltip: Optional. Provide name of the S3 bucket. Default: assets

forcePathStyle.label: Force path style
forcePathStyle.tooltip: Select this option if your S3 provider requires the path style for objects.

statusText.error_checking_file_exists: Error checking if file exists in S3
